example.parse: (IP-OBJ (LCP-TMP (IP (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 孙燕姿)) (VP (PP-LOC (P 在) (NP (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 他)) (VP (VV 创办) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 音乐) (NN 学院)))) (VP (VV 就渎)))) (LC 时)) (NP-SBJ (NN 表现)) (VP (ADVP (AD 并)) (VP (VC 非) (VP (ADVP (AD 最)) (VP (VA 出色))))))
